title: Get Qualified Leads in One Click from Apollo to Airtable
author: Not Another Marketer
readme:
## You Donâ€™t Need More Tools. You Just Need the Right Leads.

Why spend $1,000s on lead gen when your perfect leads are already waiting in Apollo? Youâ€™ve already filtered the ideal prospects. You know who they are, where they work, and what they do.

Now **imagine turning that list into enriched, ready-to-contact leadsâ€”without paying pricey Apollo's recurring subscription** _(spoiler: you will pay only 0.60$ per 500 leads)_.

## From Filter to Outreach-Ready in Seconds

With the Lead Generation System, you just drop your Apollo search URL.

**The workflow does the rest:**  
âœ… Scrapes all matching contacts from your Apollo filter  
âœ… Enriches and organizes the data (names, roles, emails, LinkedIns, companies, etc.)  
âœ… Delivers the final lead list to Airtableâ€”or your CRM of choice

No more manual exports.  
No CSV mess.  
No VA needed.  
Just qualified leads, cleaned and ready to go.

## Perfect For

  * Founders doing DIY outbound
  * Growth marketers scaling cold email
  * Agencies running lead-gen for clients
  * Anyone tired of paying too much for messy, outdated lists



## Setup Guide

I built a step-by-step guide to setup this workflow in 5 to 10 minutes, available here: <https://notanothermarketer.gitbook.io/home/templates/lead-generation>

This template is free. Enjoy!
